name: Excel
description: Microsoft Excel is a powerful spreadsheet tool widely used for data entry, cleaning, and basic analysis.

name: Python
description: Python is a popular programming language in data analysis thanks to its rich ecosystem of data libraries.

name: Pandas
description: Pandas is a Python library that provides fast, flexible, and expressive data structures for data manipulation and analysis.

name: NumPy
description: NumPy is a fundamental package for scientific computing in Python, especially for working with arrays and numerical operations.

name: Power BI
description: Power BI is a Microsoft business analytics tool that provides interactive visualizations and business intelligence capabilities.

name: Tableau
description: Tableau is a powerful data visualization tool that helps create interactive and shareable dashboards.

name: SQL
description: SQL (Structured Query Language) is used for managing and querying relational databases.

name: Jupyter Notebook
description: Jupyter Notebook is an open-source web application for creating and sharing live code, equations, visualizations, and narrative text.

name: Google Sheets
description: Google Sheets is a cloud-based spreadsheet application ideal for collaboration and lightweight data analysis.

name: R
description: R is a language and environment for statistical computing and graphics, widely used in academia and research.
